description: Application settings management including user preferences, system configuration, and PIN-protected administrative settings

components.SettingsScreen: A comprehensive StatefulWidget for managing application settings with PIN protection for sensitive configurations.

rules: Uses StandardAppHeader for consistent navigation and header design.
Integrates SettingsStore for reactive settings management.
PIN protection for sensitive settings using PrivilegedOperations system.
Manager PIN bootstrap integration for ensuring admin access.
Loading states during settings initialization and updates.
Observer pattern for reactive UI updates based on settings changes.
Settings categorization: dashboard, store, general, and salon configurations.
Remote view settings integration through RemoteViewSettings widget.
Error handling for settings operations with user feedback.
Current employee ID tracking for audit and authorization purposes.
PIN-protected settings wrapper for secure configuration changes.
Settings validation and persistence through SettingsStore.
Manager authorization required for critical system settings.
Integration with manager PIN bootstrap for security compliance.
Structured settings organization with clear categorization.
Real-time settings updates with immediate UI reflection.

components.SettingsStore: A comprehensive MobX store for managing application settings across dashboard, store, general, and salon categories.

rules: Manages four main categories of settings: dashboard, store, general, and salon configurations.
Dashboard settings: customer phone display, checkout notifications, service display mode (Pills/Icons).
Store settings: hours configuration, online booking, location selection, timezone, appointment buffer.
General settings: theme selection, sound effects, animations, language, currency formats.
Salon settings: service duration buffer, technician specialization requirements, auto-checkout.
Integrates with DriftSettingsRepository for persistent settings storage.
Reactive observables for real-time UI updates when settings change.
Error handling with user-friendly error messages and logging.
Loading states for async operations with UI feedback.
Settings initialization from repository on store creation.
StoreHours model integration for complex scheduling configuration.
Settings validation and type safety through strongly-typed properties.
Integration with SettingsManager for system-wide settings coordination.
Batch settings updates with transaction support.
Settings persistence immediately upon change for data consistency.
Default value management for new installations and missing settings.
Category-based settings organization for better maintainability.
Setting change notifications for dependent system components.
